full_summary:
**Starlink Satellite Services**
=====================================

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **Reference Number:** SSC-23-00023073:T
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM018803/23073
* **Publication Date:** 2023-06-22
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-10 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-07-07
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Nathalie Houle
	+ Email: [Nathalie.m.Houle@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Nathalie.m.Houle@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 613-301-5101
	+ Fax: 613-960-6007

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a provider of Starlink Low Earth Orbiting 2-way satellite communication services to support operational requirements. The contractor will provide high-speed, low-latency, shared capacity service plans with priority access, global coverage, including Canada's northern and coastal regions. The services will be used to complement SSC's Satellite Services portfolio and primarily for semi-permanent / fixed land applications, but not excluding aeronautical, land on the move, and maritime applications.

**Trade Agreements**
--------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procuremnt (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Attachments**
----------------

Please find the following attachment links:

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/8B11F8A5-9285-44ED-A7A2-F0F066782829
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/DF9F2CC7-124C-484
